titleStmt.title: The malcontent. Augmented by Marston. With the additions played by the Kings Maiesties servants. Written by Ihon Webster. 1604
titleStmt.author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
Webster, John, 1580?-1625?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V[alentine] S[immes] for William Aspley, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first word of the title is xylographic.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
